## Dear ${object.name}
${object.create_uid.name} requested you activate two-factor authentication to protect your account.
Two-factor Authentication ("2FA") is a system of double authentication.
The first one is done with your password and the second one with a code you get from a dedicated mobile app.
Popular ones include Authy, Google Authenticator or the Microsoft Authenticator.
[Activate my two-factor Authentication](object.get_totp_invite_url())
